alert.note: Alert for Washington (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 24 at 2:18AM CDT until July 24 at 2:45AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN FOND DU LAC...NORTHERN WASHINGTON AND NORTHEASTERN DODGE COUNTIES... At 218 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Theresa, or near Mayville, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... West Bend, Mayville, Kewaskum, Horicon, Lomira, Campbellsport, Theresa, Oakfield, Addison, Ashford, Lamartine, Byron, Eden, Brownsville, Wayne, Kekoskee, Nenno, Fillmore, Waucousta and Lagoda. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
